text:
Natsuha, you're really fired up, huh?
As always, but even more than usual...?

Yes! Sweating a lot and getting tired
will make the sauna much more enjoyable, right?

That's true...!
Alright, I'll do my best too!

Recovery from fatigue, and stress relief...
Maybe it even has a dieting effect?

No, since it's not exactly exercise,
there might not be a dieting effect...?

Sauna is said to awaken the body's natural functions
by repeating cycles of heat and cold stimuli.

It might also help suppress unnecessary appetite
and prevent overeating!

Really!? That's amazing!
Then we really need to prepare ourselves fully for the sauna!

That's the spirit!
Come on, let's keep going a little longer!
